an3.163:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.163:1.3: Attana ca panatipati hoti, paranca panatipate samadapeti, panatipate ca samanunno hoti.
an3.163:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
